text: Pierre Troisgros (3 September 1928 BnF catalogue général – 23 September 2020) was a French restaurateur. He was best known for his restaurant Frères Troisgros.House and garden, Volume 151, Issues 1-6, Condé Nast Publications, 1979 Within ten years, it became the most popular restaurant in the region and soon it was one of the best known restaurants in France. In 1965, the restaurant, got its second star, and, in 1968, its third. On 23 September 2020, Troisgros died at home in Le Coteau near Roanne from a heart attack, aged 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French businesspeople
title: Pierre Troisgros
